title: GIFBrewery 2.3.2[MAS]
description:
GIF Brewery is a Mac OS X application that lets you convert brief clips from your video files into GIFs.

No longer must you extract frames from your movies and fiddle with layers in AdobeÃ‚Â® PhotoshopÃ‚Â®. Instead, let GIF Brewery do all the tedious work for you.

In addition, GIF Brewery contains plenty of other features to express your creativity.

Features:

Extract clips from videos as GIFs or PNG sequences.
Resize or crop the video frame.
Apply image effects like Sepia, Color Correction, or CMYK Halftone.
Create GIFs with your desired FPS or manually set the frame count and frame delay.
Create GIFs with an optimized color palette.
Change the looping direction, such as normal playback, reverse, or even palindrome.
Change the number of loops for your GIF.
Save your settings for later edits.
Available for Mac OS X 10.6 Snow Leopard, 10.7 Lion, & 10.8 Mountain Lion.
Might just make you quite hip on Tumblr, provided your GIFs are less than 1MB.

Version: 2.3.2
Source: MacAppStore
